title: This Is the Affordable Work Shoe Men Need
text:
NEEDED: A PAIR of simple oxford shoes that are work-appropriate, but not so work-appropriate they’d look stodgy at the bar. An unexpected place to seek inspiration? Your high-school yearbook, where, in a black-and-white shot of the cool kids using the darkroom, you might spy a pair of classic, black “1461” Dr. Martens oxfords. Today, those shoes have been updated in a subtle, matte, black-on-black variation without the telltale yellow stitching. Less teen, more clean.

Born in 1961, the round-toe oxford was Dr. Martens’s...
description: Unlike its chunky, punky boots, Dr. Marten’s round-toe dress shoes blend in around the office. And at only $120, they’re a relative steal.
